backend/main.mo: Motoko canister implementing alumni profiles, events, and announcements with access control and CRUD-style query/update methods.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping app features to files, components, tests, and confidence levels.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Text file containing short descriptive summaries of all frontend React components and pages.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS base and theme variables defining a custom color palette and dark mode tokens.
frontend/index.html: Base HTML file that loads the React app entrypoint.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Sets up TanStack Router routes and wraps the app in theme provider and layout components.
frontend/src/components/AdminOnly.tsx: Component that conditionally renders children only for admin users, with fallback and access denied UI.
frontend/src/components/AlumniCard.tsx: Card UI displaying summary info for an alumni profile with click-to-open behavior.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileDet: Dialog showing full alumni profile details including bio, location, and contact info.
frontend/src/components/AlumniProfileFor: Form component for creating or editing an alumni profile with validation and submission handling.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementAdmi: Admin panel for creating announcements, opening a composer dialog on demand.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementCard: Displays an announcement with title, formatted date, and content.
frontend/src/components/AnnouncementComp: Dialog for composing and submitting a new announcement with basic validation and async mutation.
frontend/src/components/AppFooter.tsx: Footer showing copyright text and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Main site header with navigation, authentication controls, and a mobile menu.
frontend/src/components/AppLayout.tsx: Layout wrapper that renders the header, footer, and main content area.
frontend/src/components/AuthButton.tsx: Button handling Internet Identity login/logout with loading states.
frontend/src/components/DirectoryFilters: Filter UI for searching alumni by name, graduation year, and department.
Admin panel for creating events via an event editor dialog.
frontend/src/components/EventCard.tsx: Displays event details including date, time, location, and optional 'past' status.
frontend/src/components/EventEditorDialo: Modal form for creating, editing, and deleting events using create/update/delete mutations and local form state.
frontend/src/components/RequireAuth.tsx: Wrapper that checks authentication and renders children or a sign‑in prompt fallback.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and caches a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useCurrentUser.ts: Returns the current user’s identity, profile, and authentication/loading status.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides Internet Identity login state, identity management, and related context for the app.
frontend/src/hooks/useIsAdmin.ts: Checks if the current caller is an admin via the actor and exposes loading state.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks for fetching and mutating user profiles, alumni data, events, and announcements.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and CSS variables defining light and dark theme color tokens.
frontend/src/main.tsx: App entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the identity provider.
frontend/src/pages/AnnouncementsPage.tsx: Page that displays announcements, shows an admin panel for admins, and handles loading and empty states.
frontend/src/pages/DirectoryPage.tsx: Displays a searchable, filterable alumni directory with profile cards and a detail dialog.
frontend/src/pages/EventsPage.tsx: Shows upcoming and past events with admin controls and tabbed navigation.
frontend/src/pages/LandingPage.tsx: Presents the public landing page with hero content, features, and navigation actions.
frontend/src/pages/MyProfilePage.tsx: Allows authenticated users to view, create, or edit their alumni profile via a form.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides utilities for reading, storing, and clearing URL and session-based parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS theme settings, colors, typography, and plugins.
project_state.json: JSON describing project state, required images, and a list of implemented features for an alumni association app. It includes metadata, existing features, and image requirements for branding.
